mapper.select: SELECT ID id, PASSWORD password, EMP_NO empNo, NAME name, nvl2(MNG_CO_CD,MNG_CO_CD,CO_CD) coCd, DEPT_ID deptId, LEVEL_CD levelCd, EMAIL email, AUTH_INFO authInfo, ENTER_DT enterDt, USE_YN useYn, PWD_DTTM pwdDttm FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO TB_CM06H01 A USING DUAL ON (A.ID = #{id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET NAME = #{name}, TOT_CNT = TOT_CNT + 1, LAST_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ID, NAME, TOT_CNT, LAST_DT ) VALUES( #{id}, #{name}, 1, SYSDATE )
